thread.title: New shiny miniature Hilton -
thread.title_full: New shiny miniature Hilton - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Erik R W
title: New shiny miniature Hilton -
text: We were a bit worried the price was so low. It is a newish 30 story property. The rooms are very nice. You get a view of the Empire State Building after perhaps the 15th floor on that side of the building. There is a tiny bar and NYC priced breakfast. But you can walk outside and there is so much to do nearby. The location is in with a group of other big brand low cost hotels. You are steps from the subway.
